description: T.1 Holly - 2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.3 Yew - 2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.4 Holm Oak -Crown lift to 2m from ground level.T.5 Sycamore - Fell.T.6 Holly - 3m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.8 Yew - 3m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.9 Holly - Fell.T.10 Yew - 2m Holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points.T.11 Lime - Reduce to previous point (approx 2-3m).T.12 Laurel - Reduce & shape (Exempt).T.13 Yew - Remove Ivy (Exempt).T.16 & 17 Sycamore -Remove Ivy. (Exempt).T.20 Ash -Fell.T.21 & 22 Holm Oak - Fell.
